actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate the Democratic and Republican Presidential candidates and Vice Presidential Candidates should debate before the election of November 3, 1992.

summary.text: Declares that: (1) the American people fund the campaigns of the major party candidates and they have a right to expect formal presidential and vice presidential debates; and (2) the Democratic and Republican presidential and vice presidential candidates should debate before the election of November 3, 1992.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate the Democratic and Republican Presidential candidates and Vice Presidential Candidates should debate before the election of November 3, 1992.
